section.para: Zend\Db is a set of API's that simplify and abstract the process of storing data in and retrieving data from SQL databases, or RDBMS. Each top level component in the Zend\Db namespace attempts to abstract into an easy to use API a particular problem when dealing with a database abstraction layer. In the most general sense, these are the levels of abstraction Zend\Db provides out-of-the-box:

listitem.para: Zend\Db\Adapter abstracts API interaction with a database
Zend\Db\TableGateway abstracts tables as PHP objects
Zend\Db\RowGateway abstracts rows as PHP objects
